ğŸ‘†The default gestures
(D=Down, U=Up, R=Right, L=Left)
- D-L: Forward
- D-R: Backg
- D-R-U: Refreshg
- R-D: Scroll to the topg
- R-U: Scroll to the bottomg
- L-D-R: Close tabg
- L-D-R-U-R: Open settings pagesg

ğŸ”Permissions
